mechanics.outcome: Character chooses a Martial Archetype (e.g., Champion)

mechanics.condition: Character is a Fighter AND has chosen a Martial Archetype AND reaches 3rd, 7th, 10th, 15th, or 18th level
mechanics.outcome: Character gains features from their chosen Martial Archetype

description_text: At 3rd level, you choose an archetype that you strive to emulate in your combat styles and techniques, such as Champion. The archetype you choose grants you features at 3rd level and again at 7th, 10th, 15th, and 18th level.
